title: If someone commits Kufr he breaks his wudu, is it sufficient to say shahada, do ghusl & wudu & pray?
transcript: Hamza from Canada Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu Sheikh. Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuhu In theory if someone commits kufr like by also like not praying and also committing kufr and obviously they broke their wudu during that time if they want to accept Islam do they say their shahada and then make a ghusl because they need to make a ghusl make wudu and then go pray. Would this be sufficient for them to accept Islam? A lot of the Muslims nowadays ask about committing kufr and so many of my counseling sessions revolve around Sheikh I committed kufr and accepted Islam then I committed kufr and this is not Islam The way shaytan is making you feel and think this cannot be Islam So before we answer such questions, we have to inquire. What is the kufr that you've committed? sometimes people say I Passed by a church and I smiled so I thought that this was an act of kufr which is not Therefore you have to first of all gain knowledge and see whether what you think was kufr is actually kufr or not But to come back to your question if a person commits kufr Really, and he wants to accept Islam. He has to only say the shahada and He's not obliged to perform ghusl because the most authentic opinion is ghusl is not mandatory So if he wants to pray he has to after saying the shahada verbally to perform wudu and go and pray You
